pullRequest.title: Refactor/rename metrics related classes for NaN support
pullRequest.bodyText:
separate refactoring/renaming changes in #1790 to this PR to reduce the size of that PR
no behavior change in metrics related classes
added extra supports in StructInternalRow

nodes.bodyText: The reason for changing this class is discussed in this thread
inputschema can be null at this point.

+  public static Map<Integer, Long> getNanValueCounts(

nodes.bodyText: Since we expect to add lower and upper bounds to this class (since Parquet and ORC do not ignore NaN values), I think this should probably be called FloatFieldMetrics. That way we don't need to rename when this adds support for lower and upper.

This demonstrates the drawback to adding too much context to an exception message. The method and class should be in the stack trace and renames require updating this message. Let's keep the good error message, but remove the class and method names.

commit.message: Refactor/rename metrics related classes for NaN support
move generic testing outside of parquet folder
fix timestamp type to use microseconds instead

beforeCommit.message: fix timestamp type to use microseconds instead

afterCommit.message: fix timestamp type to use microseconds instead
